parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the ECS security group. Each instance can be added to up to 10 security groups. Separate multiple security groups with commas (,). To delete an ECS security group, leave this parameter empty. You can call the DescribeSecurityGroups operation to query the ID of the ECS security group.
